name: 2025-06-12 Major Cloudflare and Google Cloud Outages affecting service performance

updates.content:
On 2025-06-12, both Cloudflare and Google Cloud started having broad outages:

 https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/25r9t0vz99rp
 https://status.cloud.google.com/incidents/ow5i3PPK96RduMcb1SsW

This is in turn impacting the availability and performance of some of our services, both in the CMS and the API. It doesn't seem like a full outage yet, but general slowdowns so far.

These are in turn also affecting our image CDN: https://status.imgix.com/incidents/ww7rgnbpkqg7
And our videos CDN: https://status.mux.com/incidents/8l2vdkxgs0pp

This is an evolving situation and we'll post updates as we can.

It is extremely uncommon for major different internet providers to have simultaneous broad outages like this... we are not sure what is going on either, but we will try to post any information we get.
